title: Haven
description: Fleeing a violent boyfriend, Hannah has nowhere to go and no one to turn to. When her car breaks down in the tiny town of Haven, Hannah is forced to rely on the kindness of strangers… three tall, strong, and very sexy strangers… Sean, a career criminal, has been trying to build an honest life for himself and his boys for decades. They’re right on the cusp of retirement when a young woman out of options lands on their doorstep, with trouble in hot pursuit. He shouldn’t want her. He’s the dad. But just like his sons, he can’t resist her, and soon all three of them will learn they’ll do anything to keep her.HAVEN is a sizzling standalone reverse harem story with slightly taboo themes and an HEA.
author: Astra Rose
